body_html:
Currently this has the v1: version of the shield endpoint. If we make changes to shields and have 'generations' of them, in the future we will need to determine which version shield to display.

We can avoid this by saving the entire src string with the recipe and simply doing something like <img src={recipe.iconUrl} /> on the front end. We can do this a few ways, but I think changing what we store requires backend work, so I'm not positive what is the most flexible approach there.

With all that said, I don't think we anticipate changing these shields anytime soon, so maybe this is a non-issue for now.
